auth.georgian_citizen: Citizen of Georgia or residence permit holder
auth.name: Name
auth.general_disclaimer_summary: Within 5 working days after registration, a representative from the vocational education institution will contact you to provide details about the program and the conditions for starting your studies. Additional documentation must be submitted personally to your chosen institution.
auth.general_disclaimer_documentation_title: Within 7 working days after registration, you must submit the following documentation to the institution where you plan to continue your studies:
auth.general_disclaimer_item_1: A copy of your identification document;
auth.general_disclaimer_item_2: A certificate confirming your secondary education (diploma or equivalent);
auth.general_disclaimer_item_3: A health certificate confirming your fitness to study your chosen profession (issued by an appropriate medical facility);
auth.read_and_understand_rules: I have read and agree to the rules
auth.terms_and_conditions_information: The information you provide on the registration website for vocational education applicants (vet.emis.ge) contains personal data, including potentially special categories of data, according to the Law of Georgia on Personal Data Protection. Please note that your personal data may be processed in compliance with legal requirements.

programs.switchWarning: Please do not select 'Yes' if you do not have this status, otherwise your application to the institution cannot be processed!
programs.testReallocationNote: Please note that, in the case of testing organized by the center, the center reserves the right to reallocate the applicant to another test city/municipality.
programs.educationChangeNote: Please note that in the event of a change in education, your selected programs will be automatically cleared and you will need to re-select the program(s).
programs.georgianModuleNote: Please note that if you choose Russian, Azerbaijani, or Armenian language, you will begin the program with the Georgian language module.
programs.programAdded: The program has been added to the 'Featured Programs' level.
programs.educationChangeInfoMessage: Please note that in the event of a change in education, your selected programs will be automatically cleared and you will need to re-select the program(s).
